subject: FW: New Order - Wyfort
description_text:
Ariel,

See the attached last quote from Kacey.
I wait for your best OEM quote so we can process a new PO.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:ii_1934860af214ce8e91]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>

From: Kacey Zhou <kaceyzhou56@gmail.com>
Sent: quarta-feira, 20 de novembro de 2024 04:07
To: Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com>
Subject: Re: New Order - Wyfort

Hi Kacey,
Good morning to u!
The price are EXW price, pls know it, but we can free shipping to your chinese forwarder address,
And will provide export documents.The quotation have been attached, pls check it, i have keep our normal wholesale price
for your reference.
Kacey

On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 5:47 PM Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>> wrote:
Hi Kacey,

Good day!
Thanks for the PI.
However, our agreement was based on FOB incoterm.
Why are you changing to EXW? That is much more expensive for me.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:ii_1934860af214ce8e91]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>

From: Kacey Zhou <kaceyzhou56@gmail.com<mailto:kaceyzhou56@gmail.com>>
Sent: Monday, November 18, 2024 9:58 PM
To: Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>>
Subject: Re: New Order - Wyfort

Hi Paulo,
pls check the update PI, if any questions, pls kindly let me know, thanks.
Pls know it, the price is EXW price .
Thanks
Kacey

On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 2:33 AM Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>> wrote:
HI Kacey,

Please find attached the updated PO.
You need to update the company name in your PI.
I am waiting for the updated PI and packing list draft.

Please confirm if incoterm is FOB Shenzhen.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:ii_1934860af214ce8e91]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>

From: Kacey Zhou <kaceyzhou56@gmail.com<mailto:kaceyzhou56@gmail.com>>
Sent: domingo, 17 de novembro de 2024 22:54
To: Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>>
Subject: Re: New Order - Wyfort

Hi Paulo,
Pls check the PI.
Thanks
Kacey

On Sat, Nov 16, 2024 at 7:34 AM Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>> wrote:
Hi Kacey,

Good day!
I’m considering a new PO as attached.
What would be the lead time for it?

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:ii_1934860af214ce8e91]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>

conversations.body_text: Hi Paulo Franca,  I've received your latest quotation sheet and will forward it to Ariel. Thank you very much for your support!
